name: Dear Neighbor
description: Dear Neighbor is a game about breeding your dicey plants to fight the perfect looking bushes of the guy next door. Get free plants, mutate them with new grafts and discover novel varieties by breeding your best ones. Attack flowers (red) and defense flowers (blue) can grow out from flower buds and outcompete your neighbor. Each round you get a tougher enemy and prepare with better seedlings. Beware, loosing them in battle is permanent.
